data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 2, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Everaldo of Kashima is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 3, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
Kashima will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Shimizu.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu's Yuito Suzuki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 7, Keita Nakamura for Shimizu drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Shimizu.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Everaldo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 12, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Leo Silva (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 14, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 16, Kashima are coming forward and Juan Alano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 16, Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 21, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Kashima at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Kashima's Everaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
Daiki Sugioka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashima.
In the minute 28, Kashima are pushing forward but Daiki Sugioka's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Kashima's Shoma Doi breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 29, Shimizu have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Everaldo.
In the minute 29, Leo Silva instrumental with a fine assist.
Juan Alano for Kashima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Goal! Shoma Doi extends Kashima's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 32, That's a fine assist from Ryuji Izumi.
Kashima's Juan Alano gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Shoma Doi hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Kashima!
In the minute 35, Kashima drive upfield and Juan Alano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 37, Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In Shizuoka Kashima attack through Juan Alano. The finish is off target, however.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Shimizu's area.
In the minute 41, Kashima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 44, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Shimizu.
Shimizu push forward at IAI Stadium Nihondaira and Kota Miyamoto gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashima defence.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 51, Kashima's Shoma Doi breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 52, Shota Kaneko (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 54, In Shizuoka Kashima drive forward through Everaldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 55, Kashima's Daiki Sugioka misses with an attempt on goal.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Yuichi Nishimura awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Yusuke Goto is on a sub for Shota Kaneko for Shimizu.
Junior Dutra is replacing Kenta Nishizawa for the home team.
In the minute 59, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Everaldo for Kashima drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 61, Everaldo for Kashima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Kashima at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 63, Kashima make their first substitution with Ayase Ueda replacing Everaldo.
The away team replace Shoma Doi with Ryotaro Araki.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Kashima's Ryotaro Araki has been booked in Shizuoka.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 66, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's third substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Mitsunari Musaka replacing Takashi Kanai.
In the minute 69, Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Shizuoka.
Can Kashima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Zago (Kashima) is making a third substitution, with Yasushi Endo replacing Juan Alano.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Ryuji Izumi with Ryohei Shirasaki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Zago.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 74, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kento Misao is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 76, Teerasil Dangda is replacing Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Hikaru Naruoka is on a sub for Yosuke Kawai for Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 77, Kento Misao returns to the field for Kashima after picking up a slight injury.
Important block from the Kashima defence as Junior Dutra fires in a strike for Shimizu.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 79, Shimizu are back in the match in Shizuoka. Teerasil Dangda has scored to make it 1-2.
Yuito Suzuki with an assist there.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 80, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kashima's half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Leo Silva with Ryota Nagaki.
Kashima's Ryohei Shirasaki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Kashima.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 85, Shimizu are coming forward and Yuito Suzuki gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Kashima at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Shizuoka, Ayase Ueda of Kashima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 88, In Shizuoka Kashima attack through Yasushi Endo. The finish is off target, however.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, In Shizuoka Kashima attack through Kento Misao. The finish is off target, however.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Shizuoka.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Shizuoka.
Hikaru Naruoka for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
